metadata.job_to_be_done: Create and manage fillable forms for onboarding and compliance.

extracted_sections.section_title: Change flat forms to fillable (Acrobat Pro)
Create a form from scratch (Acrobat Pro)
Combining multiple forms into one PDF (Acrobat Pro)

subsection_analysis.refined_text: Use the 'Prepare Form' tool in Acrobat Pro to automatically detect form fields or manually add them. Ensure all fields are interactive and correctly labeled for data collection.
Design your form layout using Acrobat's tools, adding text fields, checkboxes, radio buttons, and dropdowns as needed. Define tab order and field properties for usability.
Apply password protection to restrict access or editing. Set permissions for printing, copying, and modifying the form to maintain document integrity.
Utilize Adobe Sign integration to send forms for electronic signatures. Track the status of signature requests and manage signed documents efficiently.
Merge various PDF forms into a single, cohesive document using the 'Combine Files' feature. This simplifies distribution and collection of related forms.
